instructions: Select Get it now . In the Microsoft Authenticator web page, select your country, enter the phone number for your smartphone, and select Send Link . When you receive the link on your smartphone, install the app, then sign in to the app. Tap the plus sign ( + ) to add your account. Choose either your Personal account , Work or school account , or Other account (Google, Facebook, etc.) . Sign in with your Outlook.com username and password. If prompted, enter the code which was sent in an email or text message. Go back to Outlook.com, then select Next . Select Finish . Two-step verification is enabled for your Outlook.com email.
